Unit test for release note


Running: getLatestReleaseNote
Last seen version: 4
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: false
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5

Running: getReleaseNoteTwoVersionsAhead
Last seen version: 3
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: false
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5

Running: alreadySeenReleaseNote
Last seen version: 5
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: false
Did not show release note drawer

Running: doNotShowReleaseNoteOnFreshProfile
Last seen version: 0
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: false
Did not show release note drawer
Release note version in setting: 5

Running: ignoreReleaseNoteSetting

Enabled ignoreReleaseNote setting
Last seen version: 4
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: true
Did not show release note drawer

Disabled ignoreReleaseNote setting
Last seen version: 4
Setting ignoreReleaseNote: false
Showed release note in drawer - version: 5
